title: GRACE KARIN Womens 2025 Trendy Dresses Crew Neck 3/4 Sleeve A Line Loose Casual Midi Dress with Pockets
description: Features: A-line, crew neck, casual style, 3/4 sleeve, loose fit, two side pockets, swing hem, and pleated t-shirt flowy dress with a simple and classy design. Medium Stretch, Suit For Summer And Other Seasons. The flare design of the pleated midi dress also highlights your uniqueness.

Material: 60% Polyester, 35% Cotton, 5% Elastane. This casual A-line midi dress is made from soft, lightweight, and breathable fabric for maximum comfort. Simple and stylish, available in a variety of colors.

Easy to match: This women's midi dress is suitable for lounging at home, but you can also dress it up with heels, sandals, a belt, and sunglasses, or pair it with mules and layered necklaces for a stunning look. The round neck design of this stylish casual dress lets you showcase different vibes in various settings.

Occasions: This 3/4 sleeve casual dress is available for just about any occasion. Whether it's spring or summer, for daily wear, the beach, outdoor activities, birthdays, clubs, dates, casual work attire, or holidays, this dress fits the bill. You can even wear it as a formal dress for parties, evenings, weddings, and more.

Size Guide: S = US 4-6, M = US 8-10, L = US 12-14, XL = US 16, 2XL = US 18. This dress fits true to size, so please order your usual size. Machine wash with cold water, using mild soap; do not bleach.
